typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		c_identifier as short,
		c_name as string,
		c_gender as string,
		c_phone_no as string,
		c_address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
Customer keyGenerate(output(Id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> Id
Id derive(first_name = split(c_name,' ')[1],
		last_name = split(c_name, ' ')[2],
		gender = case(c_gender=='Male','M','F'),
		area_code = split(c_phone_no, '-')[1]) ~> CustomerName
CustomerName sink(input(
		id as integer,
		customer_identifier as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		gender as string,
		area_code as integer,
		phone_no as string,
		address_line1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id = Id,
		customer_identifier = c_identifier,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		gender,
		area_code,
		address_line1 = c_address,
		phone_no = c_phone_no
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerStg
